# Copilot Instructions (Moodify)

- Use Node.js (latest LTS), React (Vite), Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion.
- Backend: Node.js + Express, REST APIs, Spotify Web API.
- Keep code modular and production-ready; use async/await.
- Do not hardcode secrets; use `.env` and `.env.example`.
- Prefer small, focused edits; avoid unrelated refactors.
